channel.title: Moving
channel.description:
How Do i move
*these are things i need help moving around* Portals Shops Npcs
just a few :P

item.title: Moving
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

to make a new home you have to change lots of variables…and for the portal when you moved it, it went to your new home spot (unless you entered in the coords wrong) for one search “home” in your client.java and it should have some coords under it; that is your current home location. change the coords to what you want your new location to be. then save, compile, restart. that’s just one thing I personally had to change my home and everything so i know everything you have to do i’m sure everyone else does too i’m not trying to show off lol. it’s easy. but after that go into player.java and search the first coord of your current home. it will come up with your home coords, change those to your new home coords also. that will start your new players off in your new home area. you also will have to change the death spawn point, search your old home coords again in player.java then change them to your new home coords. there will be 2 sets of them like right under eachother, there may be for the other coords in player.java too, idk just change both of them to it though. hope it helped, and Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Moving
item.dc:creator: @tbb48 tbb48
item.description:
@tbb48 wrote:

Well im trying to make a new home and that didnt help at all… when i tryed to move my portal it disipeared… my server dont got “globalobjects” its got world objects and object handler + but no global objects…

item.title: Moving
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

[quote=“tbb48, post:1, topic:193142”]How Do i move

these are things i need help moving around
Portals
Shops
Npcs

just a few :P[/quote]

For shops, it would basicly be NPC so that’s in Autospawn.cgf
For Objects like portals or banks, in GlobalObjects

Read full topic

item.title: Moving
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

[quote=“tbb48, post:1, topic:193142”]How Do i move

these are things i need help moving around
Portals
Shops
Npcs

just a few :P[/quote]

go into client.java.
search makeGlobalObject
find the correct one and edit the co-ords
to find it, you will have to search through them

e.g

makeGlobalObject(3564, 3307, 2213, 2, 10); ^^ ^^ Xcoord Ycoord

Read full topic
